description: A product page with a light box product gallery and cart functionalities. Built following mobile-first workflow principles.
A calculator for calculating your GPA with an added feature of calculating different GPA and grouping by semesters.
A tip calculator for calculating tips based on the number of people, percent to share and total amount.
A mobile and desktop responsive web page showing a company's data. Built to be very responsive for any viewport.
A web page showing job listing with filter functionalities using job tags.
A web page showing list countries from a REST API with filter and search functionalities.
A Todo List App where you can set a todo, check the box if it is completed, visualize your active and completed todos, and drag and drop to reorder.
